description: Create a new threat IOC feed.

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Send JSON object to use the API Web Services

headers.name: X-chkp-sid
headers.description: Session unique identifier as it returned by the login request

body.name: name
body.description: Object name. Must be unique in the domain.

body.name: feed-url
body.description: URL of the feed. URL should be written as http or https.

body.name: action
body.description: The feed indicator's action.

body.name: certificate-id
body.description: Certificate SHA-1 fingerprint to access the feed.

body.name: confidence
body.description: Set in order to configure the confidence of the snort protections in snort format. 1-Low, 5-High.

body.name: custom-comment
body.description: Custom IOC feed - the column number of comment.

body.name: custom-confidence
body.description: Custom IOC feed - the column number of confidence.

body.name: header-name
body.description: The name of the HTTP header we wish to add.

body.name: header-value
body.description: The name of the HTTP value we wish to add.

body.name: header-name
body.description: The name of the HTTP header we wish to add.

body.name: header-value
body.description: The name of the HTTP value we wish to add.

body.name: custom-name
body.description: Custom IOC feed - the column number of name.

body.name: custom-severity
body.description: Custom IOC feed - the column number of severity.

body.name: custom-type
body.description: Custom IOC feed - the column number of type in case a specific type is not chosen.

body.name: custom-value
body.description: Custom IOC feed - the column number of value in case a specific type is chosen.

body.name: enabled
body.description: Sets whether this indicator feed is enabled.

body.name: feed-type
body.description: Feed type to be enforced.

body.name: password
body.description: password for authenticating with the URL.

body.name: performance-impact
body.description: Set in order to configure the performance impact of the snort protections in snort format. 1-Very Low, 4-High.

body.name: severity
body.description: Set in order to configure the severity of the snort protections in snort format. 1-Low, 4-Critical.

body.name: use-custom-feed-settings
body.description: Set in order to configure a custom indicator feed.

body.name: use-snort-format
body.description: Set in order to configure a snort format indicator feed.

body.name: username
body.description: username for authenticating with the URL.

body.name: fields-delimiter
body.description: The delimiter that separates between the columns in the feed.

body.name: ignore-lines-that-start-with
body.description: A prefix that will determine which lines to ignore.

body.name: use-gateway-proxy
body.description: Use the gateway's proxy for retrieving the feed.

success.description: The feed indicator's action.

add-threat-ioc-feed (With Check Point fo.description: Adding a simple threat IOC feed

add-threat-ioc-feed (With Customer Setti.description: Adding a threat IOC feed (With Customer Settings)
add-threat-ioc-feed (With Customer Setti.request:
POST {{server}}/add-threat-ioc-feed
Content-Type: application/json
X-chkp-sid: {{session}}

{
  "name" : "ioc_feed",
  "enabled" : true,
  "use-custom-feed-settings" : true,
  "feed-url" : "https://www.feedsresource.com/resource",
  "use-gateway-proxy" : false,
  "fields-delimiter" : ",",
  "ignore-lines-that-start-with" : "!",
  "feed-type" : "Any type",
  "action" : "prevent",
  "custom-name" : 1,
  "custom-value" : 2,
  "custom-confidence" : 3,
  "custom-comment" : 4,
  "custom-severity" : 5,
  "custom-type" : 6,
  "custom-header" : [ {
    "header-name" : "header1",
    "header-value" : "value1"
  }, {
    "header-name" : "header2",
    "header-value" : "value2"
  } ]
}
